title: Does Paden want to vote for the 2020 election?
subtitle: The unfounded allegation that the President-elect ordered the national electoral officers to break the laws governing the counting of votes suggests that the President-elect ordered the electoral officers to vote at the national level.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: The campaign of President-elect Joe Biden directed election officials to consider the ballot papers valid even if they were forged, manipulated or cast by unqualified or deceased voters.
